item.title: Binary Classification Using XGBoost
item.description: The purpose of this post it to understand how to apply XGBoost to a binary classification problem. In this post we are going to see how to apply XGBoost classifier algorithm to an adult data set downloaded from UCI Machine Learning Repository. XGBoost is an optimized gradient boosting open source library knows for its flexibility and portability. It is also a popular algorithm for machine learning competitions for structured or tabular dataset. In Kaggle is it the number one choice for tabular dataset.
